Package main

Class Match

java.lang.Object
main.Match
public class Match extends Object
A match that is available for the Player to compete in. It contains an enemy Team that the player will compete against, and values for the points and money that will be rewarded if one. The mechanics for playing the match are also contained in this class as methods. A match consists of 10 rounds, with the win going to whoever has more points at the end. The basic process is the "all-rounder" positions in each team face off against eachother, combining both their offence and defence statistics. Whichever side wins the faceoff then goes on the offensive with their attacker positions, while the other team defends with their defenders. If the attackers succeed, their team receives a point. Otherwise no points are awarded to either side. The next round then begins.
Version:
1.08
Author:
mdi48

  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      public Match()
      Constructor for a new Match that will be available to the Player. Generates a new Team with a random name and random Athletes, as well as reward amounts using the GenerateStats class.

  • Method Details

    • playMatch

      public void playMatch()
      Starts the process to play this match if the requirements are met. Closes the current StadiumWindow and creates a new MatchWindow.

    • startRound

      public void startRound()
      Starts a new round. This faces the "AllRounder" positions of the Player and enemy Teams off against each other. The outcome is randomly determined, but is weighted by the combined total offence and defence of each group. So while having higher statistics does not guarantee a win, it does make it more likely. Based on the outcome the method then sets up the conditions for the attacking stage of the match.

    • attack

      public void attack(boolean isPlayer)
      This is the second stage of a round. This faces the "Attacker" positions of the Team that won the first stage against the "Defender" positions of the team that last. The outcome is randomly determined, but is weighted by the total offense of the attackers compared to the total defense of the defenders. So while having higher statistics does not guarantee a win, it does make it more likely. If the attackers win, their team receives a point. Otherwise no points are awarded. Either way, the next round is then set up.
      Parameters:
      isPlayer - determines if the attacking team is the players'

    • checkRound

      public void checkRound()
      This checks whether the current round is the final round of the match. If so, the winner is determined and the match is ended. If the Player has won, they are given their reward points and money. In the event of a tie, half of the reward is given. No reward is given for a loss.

    • checkRequirements

      public boolean checkRequirements()
      Checks whether the Player meets the requirements to play the match. The requirements are that the all of the Teams' active positions are filled and that every Athlete on the team has more than zero current stamina.
      Returns:
      whether or not the player meets the requirements

    • benchAthletes

      public void benchAthletes()
      Removes any Athletes' in the match whose stamina is zero, then checks whether the match can continue. Calls removeAthletes() method on both Teams. Then checks that there is at least one athlete still in each teams' attacker, defender, and all-rounder positions. The enemy team is checked first. If they do not have enough athletes they forfeit and the player wins. Then the Player team is checked. If they do not have enough athletes the player loses. If both teams pass, the match continues.

    • removeAthletes

      public void removeAthletes(Team team, boolean isPlayer)
      Removes anyAthletes who have zero stamina remaining from the provided Team. If an athlete from the Players' team is removed, a Notification is created to inform the player.
      Parameters:
      team - the team to have athletes removed from
      isPlayer - whether this is the players' team

    • deductStamina

      public void deductStamina(double multiplier, ArrayList<Athlete> athleteList)
      Deducts a random amount of stamina for every Athlete in the provided list. The amount of stamina deducted is small by default, but can be multiplied by the provided multiplier.
      Parameters:
      multiplier - the amount to multiply the stamina reduction by
      athleteList - the list of athletes to have stamina deducted

    • returnToStadium

      public void returnToStadium()
      Closes the current MatchWindow and opens a new StadiumWindow.
